issues.description: Low contrast between secondary button (Continue as Guest) and background makes it less prominent
issues.recommendation: Increase contrast for secondary actions or use subtle border to improve visibility
issues.promptInjection: Increase visual distinction for secondary CTA buttons with subtle borders or higher contrast

issues.description: Password field lacks show/hide toggle for password visibility
issues.recommendation: Add password visibility toggle icon to help users verify input
issues.promptInjection: Add password visibility toggle icon inside input field

issues.description: Sign In button could benefit from full-width treatment for easier tap target
issues.recommendation: Consider full-width primary button for main CTA
issues.promptInjection: Make primary CTA button full-width for larger touch target

issues.description: Progress ring at 0% shows no visual differentiation - empty ring blends with background
issues.recommendation: Add subtle track/background to progress ring to show potential progress range
issues.promptInjection: Add visible track behind progress ring to show full 100% range

issues.description: Empty state message lacks visual emphasis - could be more engaging to encourage action
issues.recommendation: Add illustration or icon to empty state to make it more inviting
issues.promptInjection: Add friendly illustration or icon to empty task state

issues.description: Daily Goals card could have clearer separation from the task list section
issues.recommendation: Increase spacing between summary card and task list section
issues.promptInjection: Add more vertical spacing between goals summary and task list

issues.description: No inline validation feedback - users don't know why Create Task button is disabled
issues.recommendation: Add inline validation hint showing required field (e.g., subtle helper text under task name)
issues.promptInjection: Add inline validation hint showing task name is required

issues.description: Date picker shows raw date format (2026-01-11) instead of human-friendly format
issues.recommendation: Display dates in friendlier format (e.g., 'Today', 'Tomorrow', 'Jan 11')
issues.promptInjection: Use human-friendly date labels like Today, Tomorrow, or Jan 11

issues.description: Category chips wrap to two lines - 'Self-improvement' is on separate row creating visual imbalance
issues.recommendation: Consider abbreviating long labels or using icon+text for categories
issues.promptInjection: Use shorter category labels or icons to fit all options on one row

issues.description: Priority colors (gold for Medium, red for High) don't follow common conventions - High should be most urgent color
issues.recommendation: Use clearer priority color progression (e.g., green→yellow→red or blue→orange→red)
issues.promptInjection: Use intuitive priority color scale: green/blue for low, yellow for medium, red for high

issues.description: Today indicator (blue pill) is clear but month/year in header could show selected date context
issues.recommendation: Consider showing selected date in header for clarity
issues.promptInjection: Add selected date to header for immediate context

issues.description: Empty state has generic calendar icon - could be more contextual to the selected day
issues.recommendation: Use more engaging empty state illustration that encourages planning
issues.promptInjection: Use friendly, encouraging illustration for empty calendar state

issues.description: No quick way to jump to specific date or return to today
issues.recommendation: Add 'Today' button for quick navigation back to current date
issues.promptInjection: Add Today button for quick navigation to current date

issues.description: Empty bar chart shows no data indication - unclear if loading, empty, or error state
issues.recommendation: Show placeholder bars or explicit 'No activity yet' message in chart area
issues.promptInjection: Show ghost/placeholder bars or empty state message in activity chart

issues.description: Large '0' for tasks completed lacks context about the time period without reading small text
issues.recommendation: Add time period label closer to main number (e.g., 'This Week' subtitle)
issues.promptInjection: Add time period context label near main statistics

issues.description: Category breakdown section feels cramped - progress bars could use more breathing room
issues.recommendation: Increase vertical spacing in category breakdown list
issues.promptInjection: Add more vertical padding between category progress items

issues.description: Four categories is good, but consider grouping stats visually for easier scanning
issues.recommendation: Group related metrics with clear visual containers
issues.promptInjection: Use card containers to group related analytics metrics

issues.description: Avatar initials 'GU' (for guest) could be more user-friendly default
issues.recommendation: Use generic user icon for guest accounts instead of truncated initials
issues.promptInjection: Use generic user icon for guest avatar instead of initials

issues.description: Settings items lack clear tap affordance - chevrons help but items could be more obviously tappable
issues.recommendation: Add subtle background highlight on settings rows to indicate tappability
issues.promptInjection: Add subtle hover/pressed state backgrounds to settings rows

issues.description: Sign Out button uses red color which may be alarming - contrast with friendly Upgrade button
issues.recommendation: Use neutral styling for Sign Out; reserve red for destructive data actions
issues.promptInjection: Use neutral color for Sign Out button, reserve red for destructive actions

issues.description: Upgrade to Pro button competes with settings items for attention
issues.recommendation: Consider moving upsell to a less prominent position or use subtler styling
issues.promptInjection: Position upgrade CTA to not compete with primary settings navigation

topIssues.description: No inline validation feedback - users don't know why Create Task button is disabled
topIssues.recommendation: Add inline validation hint showing required field
topIssues.promptInjection: Add inline validation hint showing task name is required

topIssues.description: Empty bar chart shows no data indication - unclear if loading, empty, or error state
topIssues.recommendation: Show placeholder bars or explicit 'No activity yet' message in chart area
topIssues.promptInjection: Show ghost/placeholder bars or empty state message in activity chart
